description:
Breed uses his evil abilities to turn Chopper into a pet - and force Luffy and Law to fight to the death.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Luffy Dies at Sea?! The Pirate Alliance Comes Apart!
Luffy Umi ni Shisu!? Kaizoku Doumei Houkai
Luffy disparu en mer ? La déroute de l’alliance pirate !
مروعة! تهز الأخبار المهمّة العالم الجديد!
ルフィ海に死す!? 海賊同盟崩壊
路飞海底死斗!? 海贼同盟解体
